Package doa.engine.scene.elements.renderers

Class DoaArbitraryShapeRenderer

java.lang.Object
doa.engine.scene.DoaComponent
doa.engine.scene.elements.renderers.DoaRenderer
doa.engine.scene.elements.renderers.DoaArbitraryShapeRenderer
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class DoaArbitraryShapeRenderer
extends DoaRenderer
Arbitrary shape renderer.
Since:
DoaEngine 3.0
Version:
3.0
Author:
Doga Oruc
See Also:
Serialized Form

  • Field Summary

    Fields 
    Modifier and Type Field Description
    protected java.awt.Color color
    The color in which the shape will be rendered.
    protected boolean fill
    When true, the shape will be filled, when false, the shape will only be drawn.
    protected java.awt.Polygon polygon
    The shape this renderer will render.

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.awt.Color getColor()  
    boolean getFill()  
    java.util.List<DoaVector> getPoints()  
    void render()
    Do not call this method. This method is called by DoaEngine when: This renderer is added to a DoaObject, The DoaObject this renderer is added to, is added to a DoaScene, The DoaScene the DoaObject this renderer is added to, is loaded. Use the appropriate functions in DoaGraphicsFunctions to draw onto the screen.

  • Field Details

    • polygon

      protected java.awt.Polygon polygon
      The shape this renderer will render.

    • color

      protected java.awt.Color color
      The color in which the shape will be rendered. Default value is Color.PINK.

    • fill

      protected boolean fill
      When true, the shape will be filled, when false, the shape will only be drawn.

    • render

      public void render()
      Do not call this method. This method is called by DoaEngine when:
      1. This renderer is added to a DoaObject,
      2. The DoaObject this renderer is added to, is added to a DoaScene,
      3. The DoaScene the DoaObject this renderer is added to, is loaded.
      Use the appropriate functions in DoaGraphicsFunctions to draw onto the screen.
      Specified by:
      render in class DoaRenderer
